title: President summons NA session on Nov 3
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 31 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi has convened the session of the National Assembly on November 3 (Thursday), the Presidentâ€™s House said on Monday.
The session will be held at 4 pm at the Parliament House.
The president has summoned the National Assembly session in line with Article 54-1 of the Constitution.
